name: Mark as Unread New Messages line extra space moves with it

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P3 - Deep Functions (Do extensive scenarios work?)

inline.description:
Mark as Unread New Messages line extra space moves with it
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. Have a channel with unread messages
  2. Switch to that channel
  3. Alt+click on another post to mark somewhere else in the channel as unread
inline.expectedResult: 1. The extra space around the New Messages line moves with it

customFields.Related ticket(s): Web: Extra space between posts around the New Messages line when marking a different post as unread — MM-18860
